flashes.flash: School picnic will be held on June 15th. Don't forget to bring your picnic baskets!
Reminder: The school library will be closed for maintenance from June 5th to June 10th.
Congratulations to the winners of the Science Fair! Check the notice board for the results.
The school will be hosting a career guidance session on June 8th. All students are encouraged to attend.
Reminder: Parent-Teacher Meeting is scheduled for June 12th. Please make sure to book your appointments.
Attention students: The deadline for submission of the essay competition is extended to June 20th.
Sports Day is coming up on June 25th. Get ready to showcase your athletic skills!
